name: Flight Sim-ulator 3D: Fly Air-Plane 2
description:
Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 2 is the sequel to the amazing Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 3D game. Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 2 is a fun, new, and exciting airplane flying simulator game that allows you to become the pilot of a fleet of realistic commercial airplanes and fly across tropical islands to get to different airports. Guide and steer your plane with the help from the way-points to make sure that you are flying towards the correct destination.


Make sure you go through all of the way-points to earn a star for each of the levels in order to perfect the game. When arriving at your destination zone, slow the plane down and prepare for landing, be careful not to crash! Guide your plane towards the runway and park within the marked zone to complete the level. While parking your plane, be very careful to avoid the buses, helicopters etc parked along the run way.


With the new game Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 2 comes the newly modified controls to make the experience of flying even better. With both tilt and steering wheel controls, you can now choose your preference to fly the airplane with all the skill you have. Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 2 includes 20 fun-filled exciting levels that will take you on a great flying adventure. Are you tempted to take control and fly the skies with realistic airplanes? You will be more than pleased at playing the new and exciting game, Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 2!
